name: Handball
description:
Handball is the exciting, high-scoring game of 6v6 action! In this game, you can take control of your team, strategically select your players, and take to the court! 

Choose from:

  • Three difficulty levels
  • Six team colors
  • Three player types for each position: 
    • Slow/Powerful 
    • Fast/Weak 
    • Average/Average

Game features:

  • Each game creates a randomly generated opponent, so every game plays differently.
  • Computer-controlled goalie moves to make saves.
  • Offensive players move to find open positions, while defenders crowd them out and cut off passing lanes.
  • Passive play warnings and turnover.
  • Halftime and full-time shooting statistics for each player.
  • No stoppages or out of bounds for non-stop action.

Future updates to include local 1v1 multiplayer, improved AI tactics, maybe more game music, and possibly a mobile version.
